B

BaseGame - Class in ray.rage.game
The base game provides a base implementation for the mayority of a game's behavior during setup, teardown, and the proper sequence to follow.
BaseGame() - Constructor for class ray.rage.game.BaseGame
 
BehaviorTree - Class in ray.ai.behaviortrees
BehaviorTree is a class that allows for the easy construction of a Beahvior Tree which is a technique used for creating Artificial Intelligence in video games.
BehaviorTree(BTCompositeType) - Constructor for class ray.ai.behaviortrees.BehaviorTree
Constructs a BehaviorTree with either a BTSelector or BTSequence as its root.
bind(SocketAddress) - Method in interface ray.networking.client.IClientSocket
 
bind(SocketAddress) - Method in interface ray.networking.server.IServerSocket
 
bind() - Method in class ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.glsl.AbstractGlslProgram
 
bind() - Method in interface ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.GpuShaderProgram
Binds this program to make it active.
BTAction - Class in ray.ai.behaviortrees
BTAction represents an action behavior node in a behavior tree.
BTAction() - Constructor for class ray.ai.behaviortrees.BTAction
Constructs a BTAction.
BTBehavior - Class in ray.ai.behaviortrees
BTBehavior is an abstract base class that represents a node in a behavior tree.
BTBehavior() - Constructor for class ray.ai.behaviortrees.BTBehavior
Constructs a BTBehavior.
BTComposite - Class in ray.ai.behaviortrees
A BTComposite node is an inner node that maintains a collection of BTBehavior child nodes.
BTComposite(int) - Constructor for class ray.ai.behaviortrees.BTComposite
Constructs a BTComposite with an associated ID.
BTCompositeType - Enum in ray.ai.behaviortrees
BTCompositeType is an enumeration that contains the different types of composite nodes that exist.
BTCondition - Class in ray.ai.behaviortrees
A BTCondition node is a leaf node that performs a boolean check on read-only data gathered from the game world.
BTCondition(boolean) - Constructor for class ray.ai.behaviortrees.BTCondition
Constructs a BTCondition.
BTDecorator - Class in ray.ai.behaviortrees
BTDecorator is an abstract behavior node that contains a single BTBehavior child.
BTDecorator(BTBehavior) - Constructor for class ray.ai.behaviortrees.BTDecorator
Constructs a BTDecorator node encapsulating a child node.
BTNodeType - Enum in ray.ai.behaviortrees
BTNodeType is an enumeration that contains the different types of behavior nodes that exist.
BTRepeat - Class in ray.ai.behaviortrees
BTRepeat is a BTDecorator node that processes its child nodes a specific number of times before returning a return status.
BTRepeat(BTBehavior, int) - Constructor for class ray.ai.behaviortrees.BTRepeat
Constructs a BTRepeat node encapsulating a child node and setting the repeat count.
BTSelector - Class in ray.ai.behaviortrees
A BTSelector node is a BTComposite that executes its child nodes from left to right looking for first success.
BTSelector(int) - Constructor for class ray.ai.behaviortrees.BTSelector
Constructs a BTSelector with an associated ID.
BTSequence - Class in ray.ai.behaviortrees
A BTSequence node is a BTComposite that executes its child nodes from left to right.
BTSequence(int) - Constructor for class ray.ai.behaviortrees.BTSequence
Constructs a BTSequence with an associated ID.
BTStatus - Enum in ray.ai.behaviortrees
BTStatus is an enumeration that contains the different values of and valid states for a behavior's return status.
Bufferable - Interface in ray.rml
A bufferable object is one that supports making data available for a buffer for more efficient processing.
BufferUtil - Class in ray.rage.util
A buffer utility to handle the creation of direct data buffers.
build() - Method in class ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.glsl.AbstractGlslProgram
 
build() - Method in class ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.glsl.GlslTessProgram
 
build() - Method in interface ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.GpuShaderProgram
Submits the source code to the driver so that it can get compiled and linked into an executable GpuShaderProgram.
